# HUD::PAUSE_MENUCEPTION_GO_DEEPER

## Summary
Pushes the specified state 'on top' of the current menu, maintaining current highlighted state (if possible)

## Parameters
* **FRONTEND_MENU_SCREEN** whichScreen: Which screen to "Menucept" If menu is a header (depth 0 in PauseMenu.xml), we'll change the header titles and enter the first column

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
This has the SAME effect as if you specified a MenuUniqueId of MENU_UNIQUE_ID_INCEPT_TRIGGER in pauseMenu.xml
